description: The [NETWIRE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0198) payload has been injected into benign Microsoft executables via process hollowing.(Citation: FireEye NETWIRE March 2019)(Citation: Red Canary NETWIRE January 2020)

external_references.description: Maniath, S. and Kadam P. (2019, March 19). Dissecting a NETWIRE Phishing Campaign's Usage of Process Hollowing. Retrieved January 7, 2021.
Lambert, T. (2020, January 29). Intro to Netwire. Retrieved January 7, 2021.
